title: Metric: should use commit log instead of "Replicate Raft Log" in Duration Panel
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
all tikv version

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/74427bfc-1044-463b-9f5c-490889888605)


### What did happened?
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5e6b6ad0-151a-4d83-86b5-ce64e958e9eb)
